resources.string: The first captain of the first ODI Indian team was Sunil Gavaskar.
Sabir Bhatia was co-founder of Hotmail.
Red and Green light are used to indicate foul in Ice hockey.
Wular lake in Kashmir is the largest fresh water lake in India.
Ostrich eyes are smaller than its brain.
Tipu sultan signed a secret agreement with Napoleon.
The Ramayan was written by Tulsidas.
